2164.subject: MLML
2164.descrlong: MLML 202:Mar Instrum Analysis- Principles of instruments used in oceanographic research, introduction to electronics, and applications of instrument measurements. Emphasis varies from CTD profilers, current meters, radiometry, and chemical measurement. Offered through Moss Landing Marine Laboratories (MLML); contact SEP program office for MLML registration procedures. (Offered every other spring semester.)
